fields.doc: Response field. The fields are separated with commas. Embedded fields are separated with dots. To exclude a field, use “-” in front of its name. In case the parameter is not defined, the method returns all fields.

language.doc:
Localization language. Valid values: 

"en" — English (by default)
"ru" — Русский 
"pl" — Polski

"fr" — Français

"zh-cn" — 简体中文 
"tr" — Türkçe 
"cs" — Čeština 
"th" — ไทย 
"vi" — Tiếng Việt 
"ko" — 한국어

private.grouped_contacts

list.__doc__: Method returns partial list of players. The list is filtered by initial characters of user name and sorted alphabetically.

fields.doc: Response field. The fields are separated with commas. Embedded fields are separated with dots. To exclude a field, use “-” in front of its name. In case the parameter is not defined, the method returns all fields.

limit.doc: Number of returned entries (fewer can be returned, but not more than 100). If the limit sent exceeds 100, an limit of 100 is applied (by default).

search.doc:
Player name search string. Parameter 'type' defines minimum length and type of search.
        Maximum length: 24 symbols.

type.doc:
Search type. Defines minimum length and type of search. Default value: startswith. Valid values: 

"startswith" — Search by initial characters of player name. Minimum length: 3 characters. Case insensitive. (by default)
"exact" — Search by exact match of player name. Minimum length: 1 character. Case insensitive.

create.__doc__: Method creates a message on clan Message Board.

access_token.doc: Access token is used to access personal user data. The token is obtained via authentication and has expiration time.

expires_at.doc: Date when message will become irrelevant. Date in UNIX timestamp or ISO 8601 format. E.g.: 1376542800 or 2013-08-15T00:00:00. Date must be in the future.

importance.doc:
Message importance. Valid values: 

"important" — Important messages 
"standard" — Standard messages

type.doc:
Message type. Valid values: 

"general" — General messages 
"training" — Training messages 
"meeting" — Meeting messages 
"battle" — Battle messages

delete.__doc__: Method removes a message on clan Message Board.

access_token.doc: Access token is used to access personal user data. The token is obtained via authentication and has expiration time.

like.__doc__: Method likes or unlikes a message on clan Message Board.

access_token.doc: Access token is used to access personal user data. The token is obtained via authentication and has expiration time.

action.doc:
Action. Valid values: 

"add" — Set a like for message 
"remove" — Remove a like for message

likes.__doc__: Method returns message likes on clan Message Board.

access_token.doc: Access token is used to access personal user data. The token is obtained via authentication and has expiration time.

fields.doc: Response field. The fields are separated with commas. Embedded fields are separated with dots. To exclude a field, use “-” in front of its name. In case the parameter is not defined, the method returns all fields.

message_id.doc: Message ID. Number of returned entries must not exceed 10.

messages.__doc__: Method returns messages of clan Message Board. If a single message requested by ID, all filters are ignored and total equals null.

access_token.doc: Access token is used to access personal user data. The token is obtained via authentication and has expiration time.

expires_after.doc: Search for messages with end date of relevance equal or after the value. Date in UNIX timestamp or ISO 8601 format. E.g.: 1376542800 or 2013-08-15T00:00:00

expires_before.doc: Search for messages with end date of relevance before the value. Date in UNIX timestamp or ISO 8601 format. E.g.: 1376542800 or 2013-08-15T00:00:00

fields.doc: Response field. The fields are separated with commas. Embedded fields are separated with dots. To exclude a field, use “-” in front of its name. In case the parameter is not defined, the method returns all fields.

importance.doc:
Message importance. Valid values: 

"important" — Important messages 
"standard" — Standard messages

limit.doc: Number of returned entries. If the value sent exceeds 100, an limit of 25 is applied (by default).

order_by.doc:
Sorting. Valid values:


importance — by message importance


-importance — by message importance in reverse order


created_at — by date of message creation


-created_at — by date of message creation in reverse order


updated_at — by message update date


-updated_at — by message update date in reverse order


type — by message type


-type — by message type in reverse order

status.doc:
Message status. Valid values: 

"active" — Active message 
"deleted" — Deleted message

type.doc:
Message type. Valid values: 

"general" — General messages 
"training" — Training messages 
"meeting" — Meeting messages 
"battle" — Battle messages

update.__doc__: Method updates a message on clan Message Board. At least one changed parameter should be specified.

access_token.doc: Access token is used to access personal user data. The token is obtained via authentication and has expiration time.

expires_at.doc: Date when message will become irrelevant. Date in UNIX timestamp or ISO 8601 format. E.g.: 1376542800 or 2013-08-15T00:00:00. Date must be in the future.

importance.doc:
Message importance. Valid values: 

"important" — Important messages 
"standard" — Standard messages

type.doc:
Message type. Valid values: 

"general" — General messages 
"training" — Training messages 
"meeting" — Meeting messages 
"battle" — Battle messages

in_garage.doc:
Filter by vehicle availability in the Garage. If the parameter is not specified, all vehicles are returned. Parameter processing requires a valid access_token for the specified account_id. Valid values: 

"1" — Return vehicles available in the Garage. 
"0" — Return vehicles that are no longer in the Garage.
